metadata.title: CVE-2021-3859 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Undertow that tripped the client-side invocationtimeout with certain calls made over HTTP2. This flaw allows an attacker tocarry out denial of service attacks.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
